item.title: Report X-2023101020
item.description:
Report X-2023101020

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found wet and leaking. upon inspection 4 bottles of Athena Reset disinfectant were found with two bottles cracked causing leakage. DescribePack: cracks DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: in house clean up
